channel.title: Really Quick answer Help me How do i use No-Ip with my server
channel.description: Ok here is what happends. I run my server... I Run my No-Ip program + the server on the program. Then i go to test it out by either joining moparscape (on the website) with my no-ip. How do i get it to work. It wont let me connect to anything but 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1! on my Realistic scape server when it starts up it says Starting Relistic Server on 0.0.0.0 how i change the 0.0.0.0 to my No-Ip?

item.title: Really Quick answer Help me How do i use No-Ip with my server
item.dc:creator: @DotKinto DotKinto
item.description:
@DotKinto wrote:

yes i know how to port forward but thats not what i need. i need the Realistic Server ip changed. It keeps on saying that its 0.0.0.0

Read full topic

item.source: Really Quick answer Help me How do i use No-Ip with my server

item.title: Really Quick answer Help me How do i use No-Ip with my server
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

No-IP is just a hosting service. Someone can connect to No-IP, then No-IP connects to your computer. You have to give people your No-IP address, which is shown on their site when you log in I think.

Read full topic
